description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Senior Quality Engineer
Working Location: Boon Lay
Working Days: Monday - Friday
Working Hours: 8:30am - 5:15pm
Salary range: SGD 4,500 to SGD 5,500 monthly, 13th month, SGD 350 transport allowance

Basic Functions
Responsible to provide management and technical support to product quality. This includes review and improves work processes and systems, participate in quality audits and work with manufacturing plants on qualities and operational matters. This role also requires leading the quality engineer to achieve quality standards and objectives.

Specific Responsibilities
Implements and maintains effective quality system processes in line with ISO9001.
Develops and leads quality assurance function/team and QMS quality planning process
Ensures operational process operating and meeting process/ product requirement/ specification.
Closely monitors the performance of key quality indicators (Quality objectives) and initiates, deploys and implements plans or measures to meet the goal set.
Leads team to review, analyze daily process issues and drive respective department for process improvement.
Analyzes process weakness and/or quality performance data and work with respective department on quality improvement plan.
Ensures all documents (Quality management system, Control Plan, and inspection checklist) are updated regularly.
Participates in quality improvement programs.
Ensures that the company is readily prepared for customer audits, internal audits and/or external audits.
Qualifications / Requirements
Diploma/ Degree in Quality/Manufacturing/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering
At least 5 years’ relevant experience in a similar position
Meticulous and methodical.
Good knowledge in Autocad, SAP, ISO auditing and statistical tools e.g. minitab,
Experience working in an ISO 9001:2000 Quality System.
Strong working knowledge of MS office platforms software (Excel, Words, PowerPoint).
Proficient in the use of mechanical inspection equipment including calipers, micrometer, torque tester and other mechanical equipment.


Interested Personal kindly contact WhatsApp :+65 8833 7969(Lydia)
OR
Email to : supreme.lydiachieng@gmail.com
Lydia Chieng Zhi Yee Reg No: R1988890
The Supreme HR Advisory Pte Ltd EA No: 14C7279

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Objectives of the position:

This role is for the Customer Quality Support for Company’s product distribution where Customer’s feedback & Product Quality requirements / issues are handled. The person will be responsible to handle Customers requirements such as complaints, test data & other technical information as requested. Customer complaints handling will also include the necessary communication with all the stake holders (Customer, Supplier, CS, PP, SVM, LOG). Knowledge in cable testing and specification requirements will be required to understand Customer complaints (technical & logistics).

Key Responsibilities:

1. Manage Customer complaint processes such as acknowledgement of the complaint, updating into SAP, keeping track of the complaint, closure of the complaint & summarizing for monthly reporting. Proper handling of customers’ needs by providing accurate and timely information on enquiries related to cable standards, test reports and handling of customer complaints.
2. Track supplier quality by means of in-coming inspection when required or arise from Customer complaints. Update results in SAP system and release inspected lots according to the usage decision defined. To generate supplier CAR and track for corrective action by liaising with the supplier.
3. Familiar with and comply to international cable testing standards and procedures. Contribute to achieving company & department KPIs through due diligence, duty of care & personal accountability for Quality assurance in all tasks.
4. Liaising with relevant departments to effectively close the Customer complaints
5. Maintain records in SAP
6. Operate Laboratory test equipment when required
7. Assist Customer’s Technical enquiries e.g Product Test Report, RoHS, REACH, CE
8. Supplier claim processes and 8D report.
9. Prepare and issue Customer Test Certificates & COC
10. Assist in other day to day activities related to QA department as assigned by Superior.


Skills & Qualification:

▪ Min. Diploma or Degree in Engineering (Electronics / Electrical) or equivalent
▪ Min. 2 years’ experience in electrical / electronic product testing and qualification.
▪ Knowledge in ISO 9001 : 2015 QMS standard.
▪ Must be able to operate lab equipment (calliper, visual scope, resistance checker, High voltage tester).
▪ Prior experience in SAP system is required for this role. Knowledge of cable product testing is an added advantage.
▪ Good written and communication skills
▪ Good customer handling skills and able to communicate to all levels in the organization
▪ Proficient in Microsoft Words and Excel
▪ Addresses present issues immediately and independently
▪ Possess self-confident and willing to share opinions and expertise in discussions
▪ Anticipate potential problems and takes action to avoid crisis
▪ Provide support to colleague in the Department and work as a team to achieve Department goals and targets

title: Quality Associate / Specialist – Artificial Intelligence, SAP Labs Singapore
company_info: SAP ASIA PTE. LTD. Headquartered in Walldorf, Germany, with locations in more than 130 countries, SAP SE is the world leader in enterprise software and software-related services.* Explore our 40-year history of innovation – and access late-breaking company news, financial and investor information, career opportunities, and more. SAP South-East Asia (SEA) has grown from its humble roots in the late 1980’s to become one of the most successful companies operating in the region today. SAP SEA covers a diverse territory consisting of Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam and the rest of the Emerging Markets. Headquartered in Singapore, SAP is now serving 1,222 large enterprise customers and 4,585 small and medium enterprises (SMEs) across the region.
address: MAPLETREE BUSINESS CITY, 30 PASIR PANJANG ROAD 117440
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
*SAP will be prioritizing candidates with full working rights in Singapore*

About SAP
A market leader in end-to-end business application software, SAP helps more than 425,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift societies, and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

About SAP Labs Singapore
SAP Labs Singapore is the 20th engineering hub in the SAP Labs Network and is the newest innovation hub at SAP that drives product leadership, fosters the best talent, and aims to boost ecosystem and community engagement with a variety of initiatives.

SAP Labs Singapore has the ambition to expand significantly and become the Embedded Artificial Hub for SAP, leveraging on core competencies in the current teams.

Your future team
Artificial Intelligence team as part of SAP Labs Singapore has experienced professionals taking on challenges posed by the SAP customers. Based in Singapore, you will have the opportunity to work on breakthrough projects addressing real-world problems, challenging norms with some of the SAP’s key customers. As part of the global product engineering team, you will participate in rich and engaging conversations with experts around the globe.
SAP Labs Singapore provides an open, modern working environment and the opportunity to become part of the global SAP engineering community.

Purpose and Objectives
As Quality Associate / Specialist, you will work together with a team of dedicated experts including AI developers, AI scientists, data engineers, dev-ops engineers, and architects with a single goal of building the best-in-class AI products. You will work against fixed timelines and your success will be measured by the ability to deliver solutions matching the performance of top-notch artificial intelligence systems.

EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS
Your tasks include:
Able to define quality and test strategies for cloud and machine learning based products respecting defined process- and product standards
Analyzes, defines, implements and executes quality and test related activities according to quality and test strategy
Creates a detailed test design incl. test system landscape definition and product standards, prepares tests (customizing & master data), authors and executes manual and/or automated tests
Analyzes test results (issues) and takes appropriate follow-up actions
Is subject matter expert for teams in terms of quality assurance and test related processes, methods and tools
Initiates process or tool improvements
Develop proficient product domain knowledge incl. relevant business processes & scenarios and a proficient understanding of customer needs
Develop relevant knowledge about product and process standards, important legal requirements as well as quality assurance and test related tools
Develop proficient knowledge and technical competencies of relevant programming languages and related development tools and processes
Develop good knowledge of software development life cycle and Quality Assurance methodologies
Ability to analyze complex integration issues
Ability to work in global teams with different time zones
Educational and experience requirements
Required
Degree in Computer Science or related field
0 to 3 years of working experience as Quality Associate, preferrable in AI focused cloud application development
A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in algorithms, data structures, objects-oriented programming, design patterns, multi-threaded programming, and software design principles
Hands-on knowledge in at least one of the server/ client-side programming languages such as Java, Scala, Go, Python, C#, C++
Experience using any source control tools like GIT
Experience setting up CI processes using tools like Jenkins, GitLab etc.
Experience with any unit testing frameworks such as JUnit, nUnit, Xunit, Jasmine, etc.
API Testing
Excellent written and communication skills in English language
Familiar with Agile/Scrum methodologies
Strong desire to overcome obstacles and make your work benefit SAP's customers
Excellent written and communication skills in English language
Optional
Experience with build automation tools (Maven, Gradle, Shell scripting etc).
Experience with UI testing tools and technologies such as Cucumber, Selenium, Robot Framework, etc.
Experience in using Performance Testing tools like Jmeter
Knowledge of XML, web services testing (REST or SOAP)
Operational knowledge of Linux distributions such as Redhat, Ubuntu, SUSE
Job Segment: Quality Assurance, Tester, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Quality Engineer | KQMS | Inspection Equipment | Jurong

Working Location: Jurong Pier Road
Working Days: Monday - Friday
Working Hours: 8:30am - 5:15pm
Salary range: SGD 3,200 to SGD 4,200 monthly, 13th month, SGD 250 transport allowance

Basic Functions
Responsible to provide management and technical support to product quality. This includes review and improves work processes and systems, participate in quality audits and work with manufacturing plants on qualities and operational matters. This role also requires providing guidance to the QA technician on daily inspection.

Specific Responsibilities
Ensures operational process operating and meeting process/ product requirement/ specification.
Performs Finish Good Audit on products with reference to engineering drawings
Performs dimensional, functional or other tests using specified measuring and test equipment.
Files and maintains inspection records
Reviews incoming quality inspection metrology including first article inspection and prepares a plan to minimize inspections.
Verifies and ensures closure of all suppliers’ issues including corrective and preventive actions
Manages customer feedback and enhance customer satisfaction through collaborating with cross-functional team. Develop and enhance process control system to drive continuous improvement on product quality.
Maintains all the documentations are updated and comply with ISO 9001: 2015 standards.
Participates in quality improvement programs.
Responsible for calibrations of inspection and production tooling and equipment.
Leads in ISO 9001: 2015 (internal and external) and Supplier audits.
Qualifications / Requirements
Diploma in Quality/Manufacturing/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering.
At least 5 to 7 years’ relevant experience in a similar position.
Experience working in an ISO 9001 Quality System.
Good knowledge of MS office platforms software (Excel, Words, PowerPoint).
Proficient in the use of mechanical inspection equipment including calipers, micrometer, torque tester and other mechanical equipment.
Supervisory Relationships
Reports to Manager – Quality Assurance
Organization Relationships
Frequent contact with Engineering to understand the product requirements
Frequent contact with production on daily process quality maintenance
Frequent contact with procurement on corrective actions to supplier.
External Business Relationships:
Contact with supplier pertaining to quality concern on products
6/12 Months Targets
Familiar with the ISO9001, KQMS Tier 1.
Familiar with SAP, windchill system process for daily work.
Lead the quality assurance technicians on daily work
Maintain quality assurance related data-base and generate monthly report for global reporting.
Execute corrective action process.

For complete list of jobs opportunities please visit
Supreme Full Jobs List
Part Time / Contract Staffing Telegram Group
The Supreme HR Advisory Pte Ltd | 14C7279
Ong Boon Kiet (Travys) | R22104769

Quality Engineer

Working Location: 7 Jurong Pier Road
Working Days: Monday - Friday

Responsible to provide management and technical support to product quality. Files and maintains inspection records

Verifies and ensures closure of all suppliers’ issues including corrective and preventive actions

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities
You'll be responsible for cross-platform test planning and execution within the team
Working closely to the team to understand requirements
Report the test results to the engineering team and creating tickets for product enhancement
Reproducing bug reports and prioritising
Assisting on generating automated test scripts
Helping to set up and enhance the processes aligning them with the rest of the business
Build communication within the technical and other departments
Create, maintain, manage and enforce test plan
Skills & Requirements
Have experience in automation testing
Have experience in mobile app testing
Have experience in testing APIs
Able to develop test scripts in JavaScript, Python, VBScript, Jscript, DelphiScript, C# and C++, Python, Ruby and PHP will be an advantage
Have experience in JIRA and Jenkins
1-2 years of experience in creating Test Automation framework for mobile apps (iOS & Android)
You are a tester at heart who is passionate about all forms of testing (white box, black box, functional, regression, non-functional)
Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to communicate and work effectively across the organization
Have driving experience and familiar with motorists and maps application will be an advantage
Able to conduct testing in non-office environment e.g. on the road testing
Able to provide feedback from UX perspective

We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Functional Tester / Quality Assurance
company_info: The Adecco Group is the world's leading provider of HR solutions. With over 35,000 FTE employees and over 5,200 branches, in over 60 countries and territories around the world, we offer a wide variety of services, connecting more than 650,000 associates with over 100,000 clients every day. The services we offer fall into the broad categories of temporary staffing, permanent placement, career transition and talent development, as well as outsourcing and consulting. The Adecco Group is based in Zurich-Glattbrugg, Switzerland and we are a Fortune Global 500 company listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The Opportunity
Adecco is partnering with one of the well-established and respected financial institution with a strong track record of success.
They have a culture of innovation and continuous improvement, constantly looking for ways to improve their services and offerings.
Job Qualification

Qualifications and Profile
The position requires a minimum of 5 years relevant business analyst/tester experience with Payment systems and Core Banking applications.

Functional
Good knowledge in Payment area like interaction with Clearing, payment file format ISO20022, SEPA and SWIFT. Hands-on experience with such data mapping and testing.
Hands on experience on payment systems and exposure to Payments Hub, Clearing and Settlement, Automated clearing house programs and channels.
Extensive knowledge on various kinds of payment products such as TT, RTGS, LVP, Payroll, Cheque, DD, Cashier Order, Mass & Bulk payments.
Proficient in User Acceptance Testing (UAT), Functional & System Integration testing of banking and financial applications
Experience in following areas is a plus: Retail Banking, Wholesale & Corporate Banking, Corporate commercial Payments, International & Domestic Payments, Payment Hub/Factory, Correspondent Banking, ACH, Real Time Payments, Cash & Liquidity Management, Compliance/AML, FX, Messaging (Swift and ISO) & Trade Finance
Technical
Hands on experience on testing methodologies
Working knowledge of ALM/QC/JIRA
Other Professional Skills and Mindset
Work on complex systems and a challenging international work environment
Knowledge of all phases of IT system development and implementation life cycle
Highly analytic and detail oriented in approach with Excellent communication and presentation skills, with experience converting highly complex information into clear, concise documentation.
Strong analytic skills
Capable to effectively interact with multiple stakeholders
Strives to deliver the solution in the most effective and timely manner
Proactive with excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Team spirit - Like explain and share knowledge
Hands on and versatile
As part of an integrated organization across 3 main sites (Paris, SQY, Singapore), be able to forge close relationships with program director, others team leads, architecture functions and quality assurance teams. It could be a limited travel aspect for this role.

Next Step
Click “apply” or send resume to: Tamanna Bilandi tamanna.bilandi@adecco.com

title: Customer Quality Assurance Assistant Engineer
company_info: LAPP: This name stands for innovative connection solutions like no other. Our brand stands for quality, customer service and a deep understanding of the industries and applications in which our products are used. We are the world market leader, supplying everything from cable, connectors and accessories to fully integrated connection solutions. LAPP products are used in production machinery, industrial robots, public transport, food processing, alternative energy, charging systems for electric vehicles, oil drilling platforms and much more. They are the product of choice for mountain climbers and polar explorers. With a global workforce of 4,650 people, we generated 1,222 million euros of turnover in the past year.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Objectives of the position:
This role is for the Customer Quality Support for LAP’s product distribution where Customer’s feedback & Product Quality requirements / issues are handled. The person will be responsible to handle Customers requirements such as complaints, test data & other technical information as requested. Customer complaints handling will also include the necessary communication with all the stake holders (Customer, Supplier, CS, PP, SVM, LOG). Knowledge in cable testing and specification requirements will be required to understand Customer complaints (technical & logistics).

Key Responsibilities:
Manage Customer complaint processes such as acknowledgement of the complaint, updating into SAP, keeping track of the complaint, closure of the complaint & summarizing for monthly reporting. Proper handling of customers’ needs by providing accurate and timely information on enquiries related to cable standards, test reports and handling of customer complaints.
Track supplier quality by means of in-coming inspection when required or arise from Customer complaints. Update results in SAP system and release inspected lots according to the usage decision defined. To generate supplier CAR and track for corrective action by liaising with the supplier.
Familiar with and comply to international cable testing standards and procedures. Contribute to achieving company & department KPIs through due diligence, duty of care & personal accountability for Quality assurance in all tasks.
Liaise with relevant departments to effectively close the Customer complaints
Maintain records in SAP
Operate Laboratory test equipment when required
Assist Customer’s Technical enquiries e.g Product Test Report, RoHS, REACH, CE
Familiar with Supplier claim processes and 8D report
Prepare and issue Customer Test Certificates & COC
Assist in other day to day activities related to QA department as assigned by Superior
Skills & Qualification:
Minimum Diploma or Degree in Engineering (Electronics / Electrical) or equivalent
Minimum 2 years’ experience in electrical / electronic product testing and qualification
Knowledge in ISO 9001 : 2015 QMS standard
Must be able to operate lab equipment (calliper, visual scope, resistance checker, High voltage tester)
Prior experience in SAP system is required for this role. Knowledge of cable product testing is an added advantage
Good written and communication skills
Good customer handling skills and able to communicate to all levels in the organization
Proficient in Microsoft Word and Excel
Able to address present issues immediately and independently
Possess self-confidence and willing to share opinions and expertise in discussions
Anticipate potential problems and takes action to avoid crisis
Provide support to colleagues in the Department and able to work as a team to achieve Department goals and targets
Interested applicants, please email a copy of your latest CV to ruknesh.rajamorgan@lapp.com

Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
